WHAT IFU OFFERS

OUR SERVICES

International Family Union (abbr. IFU) is a non-government organization that consists of overseas students to assist international students and their families, especially based on campus security and studying abroad experiences. Now IFU offers serviece including but not limited to ISIC & IFU Project, "Totoro" Project，IFU & DMA STEM Summer Camp，and helps related to GRE，CFA，H1B, OPT, CPT, etc. If you are looking for help that is not listed or you want to work with us for your services, come talk to us!
